chat.msg: hi there! que comience el juego!!
hi
hey! so, i'm starting at the twig near the small island with the tiger
where to from here?
ny
not sure what "ny" means, mate
should i head towards the parrot or butterfly island?
si
okay, but which one mate? the parrot island or the butterfly island?
near the elephant
got it, so i'll go towards the big island with the elephant
what's next, mate?
to the frog
alright! heading southeast to the island with the frog
after the frog, where to?
gator
gotcha! moving to the left, towards the crocodile! where to after i reach the croc?
giraffe and then the snake
alright! after the crocodile, i'm heading west to the elephant and then the giraffe!
ok
alright, i’m now at the giraffe
now, heading southeast to the snake, right?
yes
okay, i'm at the snake
where to now?
to the right of the snake
okay, i am taking 2 steps east from the snake
yes
yay! i found the treasure! *finished* thanks for guiding me, mate! was fun
hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
yes
awesome! let's kick this off. take a few steps west from the white dog
you'll see a wooden bench, head towards it but stop right before you reach the florist stand. turn around here, bud
the dog near the bench
yes, that's right! now, do a 180 and head back towards the white dog, crossing the trail again
ok
great! now cross over the wooden branch and keep heading south
where?
just look for another white dog, it's chilling next to a red and white checkered picnic mat
head over that way
yes
that's it! now you're going to walk over the mat, try not to squish the bowl of berries
keep moving west
yes
nice! there's another wooden branch, you gotta cross it to the north
yes
alrighty! once over the river, avoid the green bush by circling it from the right, aim for the florist stand
yes
go west now, just below the stand until you see a big bridge with two cyclists on it
continue past it
no east
nah buddy, west
keep going until you see the elderly couple reading newspapers
ok than pass the branch
yep! after that, step south a tad bit between the old folks and the wooden branch
there's a green bush at the end of it, head there
then 4 to the right
right on! now move east, in between the branch and the bush, keep going a few more steps
near the deer
yes! spot on! you've reached the end
good job navigating, mate!
then down two to the south
no need mate, you've just arrived at the final objective, the dear
you've done a great job navigating!
great
you rocked it, buddy! thanks for playing
you too
thank you! looking forward to our next game session!
yes
awesome! chat you again soon
enjoy the rest of your day!
thank you you too
you're welcome! take care!
ok bye
bye! have a good one!
hey there, estas listo?
hi
alright, we start at a tent in the north
which way to go buddy?
nodown
alright, headed south now
there's a dog sitting next to a fire. right or left, what do you think?
yes go south
gotcha, heading further south now
near the telescope
i see it! here i am by the blue telescope
now where?
yes now go west
right-oh, headed west now. i see some rocks and
a wooden house! i guess we got there. *finished*
hey there, estas listo?
hi
awesome! first off, find that first palm tree to your south-west and stroll right under it
yes near the dog
great spot! now, let's gently make a turn to the right
cross over to the second palm tree but swerve left sharply before you reach the third one. we're heading south now
yes now west ten spaces
hold up! we need to keep south for a bit more, and then you’ll see a brown puppy. pass it on the left
then make a slight left and a quick right. you still with me?
no ten spaces west of the dog
hold it right there, just take a little more to the west when you see the big rock, and you're gonna squeeze right between the big one (on your left) and the little one (on your right)
you'll find yourself near the ocean. exciting, huh?
hmm. didn't see that coming, did ya? anyway, head straight into the water
you'll hit a massive red crab. no worries though, just hang a right there
ok
cool, keep going west along the big rock
get a feel for the water
6 towards the rock
hold up! make sure you pass the third, medium-sized rock
after that, you'll come across a shark. sharp turn to the right then
ok
just follow the path back to land
you see that medium rock and a weird looking blue-yellow-white ball? cross between them. we're heading north now
yes than go west 5 times
wait up! before we go west, veer slightly left to the north-west, you’ll see a red tent
slip through between the tent and the big speaker close by
yes
let's dance around the tent in a curve, then head south
stop just before you reach the sea again
which way
go west, right under that red kayak you see over there
ok
then make a neat 90 degree turn to the right, heading north again
follow the kayak's path till you see a small green bush. that's our jackpot!
